# Trace, Traceback()
```{r}
library(datasets)
lm(y ~ iris)

trace(lm)
lm(y ~ iris)
untrace(lm)

lm(y ~ iris)
traceback()
```

# Debug
```{r}
debug(lm)
lm(y ~ iris)  # Debug mode in function, enter browse
undebug(lm)

debugonce(lm)  # Debug mode once
lm(y ~ iris)  # Debug mode in function
read.csv("nothing")
options(error = recover)  # Type in browse
read.csv("nothing")  # Type in browse
```
